Activity: Arrive at work, grab a coffee, and browse the latest news headlines. Staying informed is important (and it gives me something to talk about!).
Check emails and respond to any urgent requests. Prioritize tasks for the day, focusing on the communication plan.

Brainstorm creative ideas for engaging potential UHNWI investors. Think exclusive events, personalized updates, and high-touch service.

Present the communication plan to @IR, @Marketing & Communications Specialist, and @Compliance Officer for final approval. Address any remaining concerns and incorporate feedback.

Review progress and plan for Thursday, focusing on final compliance checks.
